reciters.name: Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais
reciters.biography: Imam of the Grand Mosque in Mecca, known for his beautiful and emotional recitation

reciters.name: Mishary Rashid Alafasy
reciters.biography: Famous Kuwaiti reciter known for his melodic style

reciters.name: Abdul Basit Abdul Samad
reciters.biography: Egyptian master reciter, considered one of the greatest reciters of all time

reciters.name: Saad Al-Ghamdi
reciters.biography: Saudi reciter and Imam known for his emotional recitation

reciters.name: Mahmoud Khalil Al-Husary
reciters.biography: Egyptian reciter, known for his precise pronunciation and teaching style

reciters.name: Mohamed Siddiq Al-Minshawi
reciters.biography: Egyptian reciter known for his beautiful voice and emotional delivery
